sm::eod::FeaturePoint

FeaturePoint Class Reference

#include <featurepoint.h>

Inherits FeatureOutputData.

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A feature within an image that is represented by a point.

static std::string IDToName ( ObjectID  object_id  )  [static, protected]

Returns:
a string representing a text header prefix, based on _object_id For example, returns "L_PUPILPOS" if object_id is LEFT_PUPIL_POS

void setPosition ( float  x,
float  y 
)

Set the position of this feature.

Parameters:
x X-coordinate of the feature point in normalised image coordinates
y Y-coordinate of the feature point in normalised image coordinates
Precondition:
x is invalidValue() or in the range 0..1

y is invalidValue() or in the range 0..1

float x (  )  const

Returns:
x-coordinate of the feature point. This is a normalised value (between 0 and 1) and is in image coordinates. Set to invalidPosition() if this value is invalid

float y (  )  const

Returns:
y-coordinate of the feature point. This is a normalised value (between 0 and 1) and is in image coordinates Set to invalidPosition() if this value is invalid
